name: Testin
tag_list: mobile, testing, cloud-testing, automated-testing, cross-platform, saas, android, ios, qa
overview:
Testin provides online cross platform compatibility testing for mobile applications, automatically performed across multiple real devices. Testin is dedicated to enabling individual developers and companies worldwide to successfully overcome device fragmentation, and release optimized apps to the market.

The Testin cloud platform hosts over 300 global and market specific models of Android & iOS handsets, tablets and even smart TVs, all immediately available for testing. The tests are easily executed online and require no software download or integration with the application.

Once an application is uploaded to the online service, it is automatically run on the devices selected by the user and hit with various compatibility, functionality, stability, UI & performance tests. No scripting or coding is required.

At the end of the process (up to 24 hours), the testing user receives a comprehensive report including: • Detailed pass & failure rates • Screenshots • Logs • Performance statistics • Real time information on number of potential app users the test covered worldwide, according to device selection.

With Testin any app or game can be tested in minimal time with minimal effort, enabling developers to see how their apps run, find the problems before the users, and continuously ensure compatibility with market leading devices.

The service currently supports native apps, and will soon feature support also for hybrid and web apps.

milestones.description: Testin reached 6 million app tests run on its online platform
